name: Space Shooter (itch) (Jborhi)
description:
Controls

WASD/Arrows - move

Space - shoot

Debug Keys:

/ - Restart

. - Increase Speed

A basic space shooter built for the 20 second game jam. Also my first attempt at making any kind of game. Build up speed by shooting enemies so you can reach further distances. More enemies spawn as you speed up.

Constructive criticism and suggestions welcome.
